item.title: Adb Device No Permissions
item.description: [TOC] Question 1$ adb devices 2List of devices attached 300000000 no permissions (user in plugdev group; are your udev rules wrong?); see [http://developer.android.com/tools/device.html] Fixed 1$ sudo adb kill-server 2$ sudo pkill adb 3$ sudo adb start-server 4$ adb devices 5List of devices attached 600000000 unauthorized

item.title: Postwoman CORS错误
item.description: 问题/Problem postwoman发送请求一直出现CORS，使用了postwoman extensions后只能在postwoman.io中成功，自建失败 原因/Reason 浏览器安全策略，引至CORS 原生postwoman extensions只能对postwoman官方项目生效 1 "matches": [ 2 "https://postwoman.io/", 3 "https://postwoman.io/*", 4 "https://postwoman.netlify.com/*", 5 "https://postwoman.netlify.com/" 6 ], 解决/Fix 修改postwoman extensions，对自建增加支持
